page.title: 16A Local Character
page.content: "Tex" is a local character. He came to live in Kirkfieldbank from Glasgow thirty-three years ago when he married a local girl. He has done many jobs; postman, registrar, mechanic and at present he drives a taxi, runs a mini-bus service and is the local undertaker, as well as being a justice of the peace. He is also the caretaker of the church which he cleans and helps to maintain. One of his hobbies is reading local history about which he is very knowledgeable. He recently renewed his pilot's licence and flies small planes with a flying club. His nickname came about when he came back from Texas after the war, supposedly wearing a ten-gallon hat and speaking with an American accent. Although he is now sixty, he has no plans to retire because he enjoys his work so much.
